49e53661-5d87-46cd-86da-dd77e88b4fea.name: Oxygen Storage
49e53661-5d87-46cd-86da-dd77e88b4fea.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

98d50887-d15c-4791-8592-527c93926916.name: Oxygen Storage
98d50887-d15c-4791-8592-527c93926916.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

70342b02-4e37-42df-a182-8561362578de.name: Oxygen Storage
70342b02-4e37-42df-a182-8561362578de.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

04930382-aab1-448c-8bab-ab804f7f7080.name: Oxygen Storage
04930382-aab1-448c-8bab-ab804f7f7080.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

91524db0-34bd-428e-83ca-737cf943a01c.name: Oxygen Storage
91524db0-34bd-428e-83ca-737cf943a01c.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

c2f6d6eb-24ec-43bc-b2c2-69b5b832c520.name: High Pain Threshold
c2f6d6eb-24ec-43bc-b2c2-69b5b832c520.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

081fff9e-4f05-4587-b3bb-ef07ae823720.name: Diffuse
081fff9e-4f05-4587-b3bb-ef07ae823720.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

8469c4be-d0ee-4616-9f58-62b829782d73.name: Homogenous
8469c4be-d0ee-4616-9f58-62b829782d73.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

518f1ea9-da83-4a6e-84b6-723e792c9d12.name: No Blood
518f1ea9-da83-4a6e-84b6-723e792c9d12.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

184a643e-cc79-4d8f-b637-6a89b5010b52.name: No Brain
184a643e-cc79-4d8f-b637-6a89b5010b52.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

f742d1fe-d913-464a-b58e-4f6c3983a438.name: No Eyes
f742d1fe-d913-464a-b58e-4f6c3983a438.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

dda6e137-f20b-425a-b7ab-dfb6d501c427.name: No Head
dda6e137-f20b-425a-b7ab-dfb6d501c427.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

535d8de4-ab37-4995-9206-d44861743b8f.name: No Neck
535d8de4-ab37-4995-9206-d44861743b8f.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

25640f25-dfc5-4319-b539-e6a54216a606.name: No Vitals
25640f25-dfc5-4319-b539-e6a54216a606.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

867e6716-69b5-46af-9a64-684e575d45bb.name: Unliving
867e6716-69b5-46af-9a64-684e575d45bb.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
